description: Dashboard to work on improvements for AODB processing.

targets.expr:
sum by (container) (rate(aodb_pipeline_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}[5m])) / 
sum by (container) (rate(aodb_pipeline_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average processing time for namespace pr. container

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (
(sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))) / 
(sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))) 
)

(sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))) / 
(sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])))

sum by (step) (sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))) / 
sum by (step) (sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])))

sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) / sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

sum ( sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) / 
sum by (pod,step) (rate(aodb_pipeline_step_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])))

panels.title: Step average processing times - Selected Pods

targets.expr:
sum (increase(aodb_pipeline_runs_failed_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]) ) +
sum (increase(aodb_pipeline_runs_cancelled_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]) ) + 
sum (increase(aodb_pipeline_runs_completed_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]) )

panels.title: Pipelines Message Processing count pr. min - Selected Pods

panels.description: Processing time from it is received in the adapter to it has been processed in the AODB
panels.title: Message Processing in Seconds

targets.expr:
sum (increase(aodb_pipeline_runs_failed_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}[1m]) OR on() vector(0) ) +
sum (increase(aodb_pipeline_runs_cancelled_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}[1m]))   + 
sum (increase(aodb_pipeline_runs_completed_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}[1m]))

panels.title: Pipelines Message Processing count pr. min
